New Records: Glenn Maxwell blasted the fastest Twenty20 international century on Australian soil in 55 balls
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell's unbeaten 120 from 55 balls propelled Australia to 4-241
The West Indies managed 9-207 in reply
Post-Match Reflections: Glenn Maxwell told Fox Sports that he was trying to make the most of the opportunity when the ball was not doing too much
Miscellaneous Highlights: Maxwell's innings included eight sixes and 12 fours
He reached his half-century from 25 balls and his century from 50 balls
Maxwell's total was the nation's fourth-highest in a T20I
